description:
Keep your fuel and trail essentials close at hand. These shorts have plenty of pockets so you can carry everything with you during your run or training session.

  • Quick-drying DriLayer polyester fabric wicks moisture from your skin to keep you comfortable
  • Elastic waistband with stretchy drawcord provides a snug fit
  • Sweat-resistant back pocket is large enough to carry your phone or favourite music player
  • Envelope pockets at each hip hold your gels, keys or cards
name: Brooks Sherpa 5 Inch Shorts - Men's
